name: PlanMyHealth.com
overview:
PlanMyHealth is a Home healthcare services operator based in Bangalore. It has been started by a group of IIM graduates and reputed Doctors. The core aim of the company is to offer health care services at the doorstep of the consumer, focusing on quality and prompt delivery by partnering only with the reputed Hospitals and Diagnostic clinics.

The customers have to book a service online or through telephone. Highly trained and experienced paramedics visit the patients’ homes/offices to collect the samples and deliver the reports offline as well as online.

The service is of great use to Senior citizens who might have difficulties commuting through the traffic ridden streets of Bangalore and waiting at the diagnostic clinics. The service is also targeted at working professionals who need their tests to be taken without interrupting their busy schedules. The service is also particularly helpful for pregnant women, who would be most benefitted by home diagnostic services offered. The company also targets health conscious individuals and offers them the entire range of preventive healthcare options.

Apartment: Apartments can book a day convenient for all your residents; we will require the list of people and the tests to be taken (So that we can plan our supplies). Our paramedics will come to your place at the requested time and collect Blood & other samples. We aim to make life easier for the patients.
